info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-nwpi-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for network wide path insight operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2020-2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 73

agg-client-prefix.description: Enable client prefix as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-svr-prefix.description: Enable server prefix as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-src-sgt.description: Enable source SGT as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-dst-sgt.description: Enable destination SGT as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

user-grp.description: User group classified by Cisco identity service engine to filter traffic

flow-mon.description:
Enable flow monitor to collect statistics of per application TCP and UDP flow count,
         flow setup rate, and average flow living time.

pol-mon.description:
Enable SD-WAN policy monitor to collect statistics of per application
         policy sequence match rate.

full-vis.description:
Enable full traffic visibility to process flexible aggregation on all traffic flows,
         flexible aggregation only process sampled flows when this option disabled.

agg-user-name.description: Enable destination user name as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

te-mon.description:
Enable ThousandEyes agent monitor to collect statistics of ThousandEyes synthetic
         probes.

qos-congest-dur.description: Duration of QoS congestion to raise an alarm

ar-drop-rate.description: Anti-replay drop rate on SD-WAN session

wan-loss-rate.description: WAN loss rate on SD-WAN session

te-agent.description: ThousandEyes agent IP addresses to filter traffic

req-times.description: Count of DNS requests on this path in this report interval

is-redi.description: Is DNS request redirected on this path

total-req-times.description: Count of DNS requests on all paths for all times

export-time.description: Absolute time of the export record event

protocol.description: IP protocol field in IP header to filter

app-grp.description: Application grouped by vendors to filter

spl-intvl.description: Trace one flow in each sample interval

model.description:
Trace model, different trace models have different behaviors
         and separate trace identifier space. Combination of trace model
         and trace identifier can uniquely identify a trace.

agg-client-prefix.description: Enable client prefix as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-svr-prefix.description: Enable server prefix as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-src-sgt.description: Enable source SGT as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

agg-dst-sgt.description: Enable destination SGT as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

username.description: Username classified by Cisco identity service engine to filter traffic

user-grp.description: User group classified by Cisco identity service engine to filter traffic

src-sgt.description: Source security group tag to filter traffic

dst-sgt.description: Destination security group tag to filter

flow-mon.description:
Enable flow monitor to collect statistics of per application TCP and UDP flow count,
         flow setup rate, and average flow living time.

pol-mon.description:
Enable SD-WAN policy monitor to collect statistics of per application
         policy sequence match rate.

full-vis.description:
Enable full traffic visibility to process flexible aggregation on all traffic flows,
         flexible aggregation only process sampled flows when this option disabled.

agg-user-name.description: Enable destination user name as a grouping factor in flexible aggregation

te-mon.description:
Enable ThousandEyes agent monitor to collect statistics of ThousandEyes synthetic
         probes.

qos-congest-dur.description: Duration of QoS congestion to raise an alarm

ar-drop-rate.description: Anti-replay drop rate on SD-WAN session

wan-loss-rate.description: WAN loss rate on SD-WAN session

te-agent.description: ThousandEyes agent IP addresses to filter traffic
